question: Who among the following was the chairman of Commission to examine Sub-categorization of other Backward Classes?
explanation: To examine the sub-categorization of the other Backward classes (OBCs), President of India had appointed a five member commission under the chairmanship of Justice Rohini. The objective of the commission is to ensure that more backward among OBC communities avail the benefits of reservation. The president appointed the commission in exercise of the powers conferred by Article 340 of the constitution
